details.featuresDescription: Everything you need for a high-performance website.

creation.heroDescription: A high-performance website with custom design, logo creation, professional typography, complete SEO optimization, and Google Business Profile integration. Everything you need to dominate your local market.
creation.longDescription:
For only €400, get much more than a simple website. I create your complete digital presence: modern and fast website, professional logo creation if needed, harmonious typography selection, advanced SEO optimization with local keywords, Google Maps integration, Google Business Profile enhancement, and much more.

Every element is designed to maximize your local visibility and convert your visitors into customers. From graphic design to technical optimization, I take care of EVERYTHING so you can focus on your business while your site works for you 24/7.

Whether you're a craftsman, merchant, restaurant, freelancer, or service business, this complete package positions you above your competitors on Google and Google Maps in your geographic area.

benefits.title: Complete Professional Design
benefits.description: Modern and responsive interface with complete visual identity: custom logo, coherent color palette, and carefully selected typography to reflect your professionalism.

benefits.title: Maximum Local Visibility
benefits.description: Complete SEO optimization with local keywords, Schema.org data structuring, Google Maps integration, and Google Business Profile enhancement to appear at the top of results.

benefits.title: Reassuring Presence
benefits.description: Your Google client reviews displayed attractively, clear contact information, professional presentation of your services and prices to inspire immediate confidence.

benefits.title: Technical Performance
benefits.description: Ultra-fast site optimized for mobile and desktop, secure SSL certificate, compliance with modern web standards for optimal SEO.

benefits.title: Advanced System Available
benefits.description: Option to add client authentication system and/or online booking system according to your specific needs.

benefits.title: Optimized Google Business
benefits.description: I take care of improving and optimizing your Google Business Profile: professional photos, relevant categories, updated hours, and direct link to your site.

features.title: Complete Responsive Website
features.description: Modern design adapted to all screens (mobile, tablet, desktop) with intuitive navigation and optimal user experience.

features.title: Professional Logo Creation
features.description: If you don't have a logo, I create a unique visual identity that perfectly represents your business and sets you apart from the competition.

features.title: Typography & Brand Guidelines
features.description: Selection of professional fonts, color palette definition, and creation of visual consistency throughout the site.

features.title: Complete Local SEO
features.description: Research and integration of relevant local keywords, title and meta tag optimization, Schema.org LocalBusiness markup, XML sitemap, and Google Search Console submission.

features.title: Google Maps Integration
features.description: Interactive map with your precise location, easy directions for your clients, and service area display.

features.title: Optimized Google Business Profile
features.description: Complete verification and optimization of your listing: primary and secondary categories, SEO-optimized description, relevant attributes, photo management, and link to your new site.

features.title: Google Reviews Display
features.description: Customer review widget synchronized with your Google Business account to display your best ratings and strengthen your credibility.

features.title: Essential Pages
features.description: Impactful homepage, detailed Services page with your offerings and prices, About page to humanize your business, Contact page with functional form.

features.title: Optimized Contact Form
features.description: Secure form with validation, instant email notifications, and possible integration with your CRM or WhatsApp Business.

features.title: SEO-Optimized FAQ Section
features.description: Structured Q&A page to improve your SEO and answer your prospects' questions before they even contact you.

features.title: Visible Practical Information
features.description: Opening hours, clickable phone number (direct call from mobile), email, address, social media links clearly displayed.

features.title: Authentication System (Option)
features.description: Secure client area with login/registration, profile management, for your services requiring private access.

features.title: Booking System (Option)
features.description: Integrated online booking calendar, availability management, automatic email confirmations for restaurants, salons, consultants, etc.

features.title: Speed Optimization
features.description: Compressed and optimized images, minified code, smart caching for ultra-fast loading times (Google PageSpeed score >90).

features.title: SSL Certificate & Security
features.description: Secure HTTPS included to protect your visitors' data and improve your Google ranking.

features.title: All-Browser Compatible
features.description: Works perfectly on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and all modern browsers.

features.title: Training & Documentation
features.description: Complete guide to manage your content, video tutorial if needed, and WhatsApp support available after delivery.

features.title: Analytics & Tracking
features.description: Google Analytics 4 installation to track your visitors, traffic sources, and conversions.

features.title: Complete Ownership
features.description: You are 100% owner of your site, your domain name, and all your content. No forced subscription.

faq.question: What exactly is included in the €400?
faq.answer: EVERYTHING listed above: complete responsive website, logo creation (if needed), typography selection, complete local SEO optimization, Google Maps integration, Google Business Profile optimization, client review display, contact form, first year hosting, first year domain name, SSL certificate, and training. Authentication and booking systems are available as options with additional cost depending on complexity.

faq.question: How many pages are included for €400?
faq.answer: The standard package includes 5 essential pages: Home, Services/Offerings, About, Contact, and FAQ. If you need additional pages, we can add them with a reasonable supplement (typically €50-80 per additional page).

faq.question: I don't have a logo, is it really included?
faq.answer: Yes! If you don't have a logo yet, I create a professional visual identity adapted to your industry. You'll receive 2-3 design proposals and we'll refine the one you prefer until you're completely satisfied.

faq.question: How does SEO optimization work?
faq.answer: I do thorough keyword research for your sector and geographic area (city, region). I then optimize each page with these keywords: titles, descriptions, tags, structured content. I also add Schema.org markup for LocalBusiness, create an XML sitemap, and submit your site to Google Search Console. Result: you appear in relevant local searches.

faq.question: In which geographic area can I be visible?
faq.answer: Your visibility depends on your service area. I can optimize for a specific city (e.g., 'plumber Paris 15'), multiple cities (e.g., 'restaurant Lyon Villeurbanne'), or an entire region (e.g., 'landscaper Île-de-France'). The more targeted your area, the better your positioning.

faq.question: How do you improve my Google Business Profile?
faq.answer: I optimize your existing listing or create it if necessary: I choose the right categories (primary + secondary), write an SEO-optimized description with keywords, add all relevant attributes to your business, structure your services with prices if applicable, add quality photos, and link your website. All this improves your visibility on Google Maps and in the Knowledge Panel.

faq.question: Will my Google reviews really be displayed on my site?
faq.answer: Yes, I integrate a widget that displays your Google reviews in real-time on your homepage. This immediately strengthens visitor trust and improves your conversion rate. It's like having your social proof directly on your site.

faq.question: What's the online booking system?
faq.answer: If your activity requires appointments (restaurant, hair salon, doctor, coach, etc.), I can integrate an online booking calendar. Your clients choose their slot, receive automatic email confirmation, and you manage your availability from a simple interface. It's an additional option as it requires more development.

faq.question: What's the authentication system for?
faq.answer: If you offer services requiring a private client area (training, subscriptions, private documents, personalized tracking), I can create a secure registration/login system. Your clients create an account, log in, and access their personalized content. It's also an option with additional cost.

faq.question: How long to receive my site?
faq.answer: Allow 7 to 14 business days depending on complexity and availability of your content (texts, photos). If you provide everything quickly, I can deliver in 7 days. If we need to create a logo and optimize a lot of content, it may take 14 days.

faq.question: What do I need to provide to start?
faq.answer: Very simple: basic information (name, address, phone, email, hours), description of your services/products, texts to present your company, quality photos if you have them (otherwise I can help you find or create visuals), and your logo if you have one. I guide you step by step with a detailed questionnaire.

faq.question: After delivery, do you abandon me?
faq.answer: Never! You have 30 days of free support after delivery for any questions or small adjustments. After that, I remain available on WhatsApp for occasional changes (typically €30-50/hour for minor changes). You can also subscribe to a monthly maintenance plan (from €49/month) for regular updates.

faq.question: Do I really own my site 100%?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You own your domain name, your hosting, and all your site files. I give you all access and you're free to go to another provider at any time. No tricks, no forced subscription. It's YOUR site.

faq.question: Why €400 when others offer cheaper?
faq.answer: Because I include EVERYTHING: custom design (not generic template), logo if needed, real SEO optimization (not just installing a plugin), Google Business Profile integration and optimization, personalized training, and clean, fast code. Others offer cheaper but with basic templates, no real SEO, and no support. You pay for a result that generates clients, not just a pretty site.

faq.question: Can I see examples of sites you've created?
faq.answer: Yes of course! Check out my portfolio on the homepage or contact me directly on WhatsApp to see projects similar to your business. I'll be happy to show you concrete achievements.

faq.question: What if I want additional features?
faq.answer: No problem! The €400 package is a solid foundation. If you want to add features like booking system, authentication, an e-commerce store, or a blog with CMS, we can create a custom quote. I'm flexible and adapt to your needs and budget.

faq.question: How does payment work?
faq.answer: Simple and secure: €200 deposit at project start to secure my availability and begin work, then €200 at final delivery once you're satisfied. Payment by bank transfer or PayPal according to your preference.

faq.question: I'm not in France, do you work internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, I work with clients throughout the francophone world (France, Belgium, Switzerland, Canada, French-speaking Africa, etc.). Local SEO optimization adapts to your country and language. The principles are the same everywhere.

ecommerce.heroTitle: Sell more, everywhere, all the time
ecommerce.heroDescription: Launch your online store with robust technology and a seamless shopping experience that builds customer loyalty.
ecommerce.longDescription:
Online commerce is a race for speed and trust. A high-performing e-commerce store must instantly reassure the buyer, load fast, and simplify the checkout process to the extreme.

We develop complete e-commerce solutions that manage not only sales but also all digital logistics: inventory management, shipping, automated taxes, and customer notifications. Whether you have 10 or 10,000 products, our scalable architectures grow with your revenue, without compromising security or speed.

benefits.description: An intuitive interface to manage your products, stocks, and orders without stress.

faq.question: What payment methods can I accept?
faq.answer: We mainly integrate Stripe and PayPal, allowing acceptance of Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

faq.question: Is there a product limit?
faq.answer: No, our technical solutions can handle thousands of references without slowdown.

faq.question: How is inventory managed?
faq.answer: Stock is automatically decremented with each sale. You can set low stock alerts.

seo.title: E-Commerce Store Creation | Kalissea Agency
seo.description: Launch your online store with expert help. Secure payments, stock management, and sales-driven design. Free quote.

maintenance.heroTitle: Your peace of mind, our priority
maintenance.heroDescription: Focus on your business, we'll take care of the rest. Guaranteed security, updates, and performance.
maintenance.longDescription:
A website isn't a finished product; it's a living organism that requires constant care to remain performant and secure against changing web threats.

Our preventive and corrective maintenance service ensures your work tool is always operational. We monitor your site 24/7, apply security patches even before you know a vulnerability exists, and regularly optimize the database to maintain optimal loading speed.

benefits.title: Maximum Security
benefits.description: 24/7 monitoring and protection against intrusions and malware.

benefits.title: Daily Backups
benefits.description: Never lose your data. We back up your site every day.

benefits.title: Priority Support
benefits.description: A question? A change? Our team is there for you in a click.

features.title: Automatic Updates
features.description: Weekly updates for security and performance.

features.title: Uptime Monitoring
features.description: Site availability check every minute.

features.title: Cloud Backups
features.description: Encrypted backups stored on external server.

features.title: Malware Scan
features.description: Daily infected file analysis.

features.title: Monthly Report
features.description: Detailed PDF of actions performed and site status.

features.title: Fast Restoration
features.description: Site restoration in case of crash in less than 1h.

faq.question: What happens if my site is hacked?
faq.answer: If you are under a maintenance contract, we clean and restore your site for free and immediately.

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Yes, our plans are non-binding. You are free.

faq.question: Does the plan include edits?
faq.answer: Business and Premium plans include hours of small content changes (text, images).

maintenance.ctaDescription: Choose the maintenance plan that suits you and sleep soundly.

seo.heroDescription: Don't just be present online—be visible to those looking for you. A results-driven SEO strategy.
seo.longDescription:
The most beautiful site in the world is useless if no one finds it. SEO (Search Engine Optimization) isn't magic; it's a precision science that aligns your content with your customers' search intent.

Our SEO approach is holistic: we work on technique (speed, structure), content (semantics, relevance), and authority (netlinking). We don't just aim for the first position; we aim for the position that generates qualified revenue.

benefits.title: Full Audit
benefits.description: In-depth technical analysis to identify all growth levers.

benefits.title: Strategic Content
benefits.description: Optimized articles to attract and engage your target audience.

benefits.title: Quality Backlinks
benefits.description: Strengthen your domain authority with links from trusted sites.

features.description: Identification of high-potential transactional terms.

features.title: On-Page Optimization
features.description: Titles, metas, Hn tags, and internal linking.

features.title: Technical SEO
features.description: Core Web Vitals, indexing, and crawl budget.

features.title: Content Marketing
features.description: Creation of rich content positioning your expertise.

features.title: Netlinking
features.description: Thematic link acquisition campaigns.

features.title: Tracking & Reporting
features.description: Ranking and organic traffic monitoring.

faq.question: How long before seeing results?
faq.answer: SEO is a long game. First results typically appear between 3 and 6 months but are lasting.

faq.question: Do you guarantee #1 ranking?
faq.answer: No serious agency can guarantee #1 ranking because Google's algorithm is secret. We guarantee an increase in qualified traffic.

faq.question: What's the difference between SEO and Google Ads?
faq.answer: SEO is organic and free per click (long term). Google Ads is paid immediately (short term). Both are complementary.

seo.title: SEO Agency & Organic Search | Kalissea
seo.description: Boost your visibility on Google. SEO audit, content strategy, and netlinking for more traffic and clients.

branding.heroDescription: More than a logo, we create a universe that tells your story and resonates with your ideal customers.
branding.longDescription:
Your brand is what people say about you when you're not in the room. It's a precious intangible asset that inspires trust and justifies your prices.

We build cohesive brand identities that stand the test of time. From color psychology to typographic choice, every creative decision is rooted in your business strategy. We don't just make 'pretty'; we make 'right'.

branding.ctaDescription: Let's create a brand image that reflects you and captivates your audience.

automation.heroTitle: AI at the service of your growth
automation.heroDescription: Automate repetitive tasks and integrate artificial intelligence to gain efficiency and scale without limits.
automation.longDescription:
Automation isn't reserved for tech giants. Today, every company can multiply its productivity by delegating time-consuming tasks to intelligent algorithms.

We connect your existing tools (CRM, Email, Website, Project Management) to create fluid workflows. Imagine: a lead fills out a form, gets automatically added to your CRM, receives a personalized email, and a task is created for your sales rep. Zero clicks, zero errors, 100% efficiency.

benefits.title: Smart Workflows
benefits.description: Connect your tools and automate your complex business processes.

benefits.title: AI Chatbots
benefits.description: Respond to your customers 24/7 with smart, personalized assistants.

benefits.title: Save Time
benefits.description: Free yourself from low-value tasks to focus on what matters most.

features.title: Content Generation
features.description: AI tools to write emails and social posts.

features.title: Data Scraping
features.description: Automatic web data extraction.

features.title: Dashboarding
features.description: Automated dashboards for your KPIs.

faq.question: Will AI replace my employees?
faq.answer: No, it will augment them. AI rids them of tedious tasks so they can focus on customer relations and strategy.

faq.question: Is it secure?
faq.answer: Yes, we use recognized tools (Make, Zapier, OpenAI) with high security standards (SOC2, GDPR).

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Automation has a very fast ROI. We bill per project or flow maintenance, often profitable in a few months.
